title: Karma has a pretty low win rate vs other supports
body:
Idk, she's my favourite and my win rate with her always fluctuates between 54-58%. I usually play her mid with support items with some okay results.

When I play support with Karma, she feels somewhat lacking. She doesn't have abilities that guarantee a kill for his adc such as Blitz's grab near a tower, or braum's passive stun and slow.

replies.body: It's because she has no place in the support role, nothing sets her apart (not even damage  - {{champion:25}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:99}} ). She'll always either be the best option or a non-option in her current state.

She has no place anywhere.
She has some nice things going for her, but her cohesion is a train wreck.

Karma has 3 viable builds with 1 skill each and 2 skills that just... Exist. That in and of itself should be a red flag.
100% agree.
I thought she was meant to have a mini rework soon, I hope they havent forgotten about that.

To be honest, we should be happy Meddler hasn't spoken about that Karma rework so soon. I reckon it's because the team is deciding between a large update vs. a small update.

Irelia's update should hit in May, so I assume Karma's will come along after that. The fact that they deliberately left the next update after Irelia empty goes to show they're putting a lot of thought in to the next rework. And given how silent they are about it, if it's Karma, I'm willing to assume its now a full scale update, which is good.

Really? Wouldn't have guessed that. She's my go to ban. Lol. Her damage is really high for a "traditional" support champ. Her shielding is also insane. Would not have guessed that she's weak right now. If I'm not and face one, I have to try and survive the lane. If I'm mid/jg and they have one, I can't kill their carries. I feel a bit noob for finding a 'weak champ so op :(
She's not a "traditional" support, that's why she has that damage.
Meh.  She's way more like lulu/nami than she is brand/zyra.  She's more of an enchanter than a mage is what I meant.

And that's why she's having problems, Karma has always been a utility mage, but then a Rioter decided to put her in the Lulu play space. Karma is for both solo and duo lanes like Morgana, "traditional" supports ({{champion:40}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:16}}{{champion:37}} ) have too much utility to solo lane fairly - so they're not typically allowed.

Karma is supposed to be a Battlemage/Enchanter hybrid.
'Always' being prerework? I could be stupid, but I don't recall her being played outside of bot much, since the rework, except for cheese strats - like tank karma top. Lol.

Karma both before and after the rework was played a lot in solo lanes building AP. Karma has always been more effective when building AP, that's why she tends to have a higher W/R in mid than bot. The only time she has a positive W/R in bot is when she's broken and is pick/ban in competitive.

Pre-rework Karma apparently was played more in solo lanes because of how gold dependent she was, her rework just opened up bot as a viable option for her.

Edit: Also, the top lane tank Karma cheese strat only really became a thing after 5.10 since the removal of the Renewal (RW) damage component. All that remained after that was the RW's missing HP scalings with no real incentive to build AP.

There are many other champions who do her job way better in every way, with additional added perks.

Building her as an Enchanter? Why pick Karma when you can pick Lulu or Janna?

Building her for damage? Why pick Karma when you can pick... Well, literally any other champion.

Building her tanky for CC? Why pick Karma when you can pick Morgana, Blitzcrank, Braum or Thresh?

I agree 100%. I recently started playing Karma support a lot, and I don't feel like I'm contributing anything significant to my team. What makes matters worse, because of the way her stun works, I have to get in the danger zone a lot and that results in me dying more often than I should as support.
*snare.

They gutted her shields a couple seasons ago because she fucked shit up at Worlds, then left her in that state. Because of how oppressive her E and R->E are in coordinated play, expect her to be deliberately bad for awhile.
Agreed, be on the look out for the other outspoken Karma mains that mention her on the boards. Upvoted

They can't straight buff her since her whole kit is just a giant middle finger to anything melee. she needs bigger changes. also riot has real trouble balancing champs without actual ultimate abilities like {{champion:76}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:77}}

What do you think of her now with the new ap items? I think Karma is just fine now. 

I have been a karma main since season 4. It's true that last season she was nerfed too hard. But after that other utility mages gor nerfed too. Now with the new items I have been able to go almost full AP on her. With that my winrate jumped up to 70% with karma. 

It's true she lacks utility to be a support like that, but I like to use her as a control mage type champion. It just takes a while to master her fully and know which ability to empower on a certain situation. For example people forget how insane the heal of her mantra W can be when you are low, so you can use that to bait alot.
her root and she has some strong assss poke
Yeah I agree. It makes me sad to see my favourite champion this way. I usually feel like she’s less then the enemy support, what shouldn’t happen.
